item.title: Homebridge Restore Backup
item.description: Issue When updating homebridge in docker with the onzu build, sometimes you may not be able to restore from your backup. I was able to restore via the command line; however, I had to manually reinstall my plugins. The good news is once you install the plugins via the Web UI, you do not have to reconfigure. Fix Extract your homebridge-backup.tar.gz into a folder. Navigate to /var/lib/docker/volumes/homebridge_homebridge/_data (you may have to switch to root - sudo su).
